name: qol_research_jatmn
title: Quality of Life research - Krastorio 2 (By: JATMN)
author: JATMN
description:
The mod adds a bunch of Quality of Life researches/bonuses to the game. You can configure it to cherry pick which ones you want. 
 NOTE: This mod configuration has been adjusted for Krastorio 2 research cards. (Infinite now works!) 
 Original Mod By: Aidiakapi
